author: Home Repair Tutor
description: PVC drain pipe tips…I’m connecting new shower and sink plumbing to the old DWV. The Husky manual PVC is great for tight spots, but a Hackzall would work, too. I use the DEB4 to chamfer all my pipes because the beveled edge makes solvent welds stronger. All this plumbing is sloping at least 1/4 inch per linear foot 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #diy
title: PVC Drain Pipe Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
